sectionTwo.gamingHub:
All-in-One Gaming Hub:
Play, Top Up & Pay
sectionTwo.gamingHubLg: All-in-One Gaming Hub: Play, Top Up & Pay
sectionTwo.gamingHubSubtitle: Your one-stop shop for everything gaming - explore a vast library, unlock deals & rewards, and manage your everyday essentials, all within the app.
sectionTwo.selectionDescription: Get access to top in-game currencies for your favourite mobile and online games, all in one place.
sectionTwo.vouchersDescription: We offer a wide range of in-app vouchers and gift cards for your favourite titles, with instant top-ups for quick access.
sectionTwo.dataDescription: Never lose touch! Top up your airtime and mobile data with all major Nigerian providers for seamless communication and uninterrupted online gaming.
sectionTwo.electricityDescription: Pay your electricity bills conveniently through DataUp Gaming, supporting various providers nation wide
sectionTwo.cableDescription: Pay your electricity bills conveniently through DataUp Gaming, supporting various providers nation wide

sectionThree.story: DataUp Gaming was founded by gamers, for gamers. We understand the frustration of running out of in-game currency or data at a crucial moment. That's why we created DataUp Gaming – a convenient and reliable platform for all your gaming needs. We offer a wide variety of services to make your gaming experience smoother and more enjoyable. Join the DataUp Gaming community today and power up your play!

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be the leading force in transforming the African games market by providing seamless payment solutions and fostering a thriving ecosystem for game publishers and players alike.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To empower game publishers to achieve unparalleled success in Africa by offering frictionless payment options, and facilitating user acquisition.

sectionFour.upgradeGamingExperienceSubtitle: Head over to our shop and browse our extensive selection of in-game currencies and resources. We've got everything you need to take your gaming experience to the next level!

sectionFive.playMoreSubtitle: Play More, Spend Less: Get access to competitive prices on a wide variety of games and in-game currencies. Save money to spend more time on what you love - gaming!
sectionFive.topUpSubtitle: Top-up your favourite games instantly and securely with our diverse payment methods. No more hassle with complicated processes or hidden fees.
sectionFive.communitySubtitle: Connect with other gamers across Africa. Share tips, discuss strategies, and find your next gaming buddy.
sectionFive.customerSupportSubtitle: We're here for you. Our dedicated customer support team is always available to answer your questions and assist you with any issues you may encounter.
sectionFive.paymentMethodSubtitle: Pay the way you want. We offer a wide range of secure payment methods to fit your needs, including credit cards, debit cards, and local payment options

sectionSeven.gamingPatnerSubtitle: Expand your reach and tap into the thriving African gaming market by partnering with DataUp Gaming. We offer a win-win partnership program that benefits both businesses.

benefitsOfPartnership.title: Benefits of Partnership
benefits: Increased brand awareness among a passionate gaming audience.
Access to a reliable and secure platform for in-game transactions.
Opportunity to reach new customers and expand your market share.

sectionEight.supportTeam: Our dedicated customer support team is always available to answer your questions and assist you with any issues you may encouter.

address.title: Visit our office
address.address: 21, University Permanent Site road, Tanke, Kwara state, Nigeria.

newsletter.title: Join our newsletter
newsletter.subtitle: We’ll send you a nice letter once per week. No spam.
